name: Beanie Babies A-Z Quiz Series - R  | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which of these palindromes is a bat?
questions.explanation:
Radar.

	A palindrome is a word or phrase that is spelled the same front and back, like "mom" or "step on no pets."  Radar is a black bat with red eyes.  He is related to Batty. "Radar the bat flies late at nightHe can soar to an amazing heightIf you see something as high as a starTake a good look, it might be Radar!"

questions.text: Which of these is the same animal as Twitch?
questions.explanation:
Reese.

	Both Reese and Twitch are guinea pigs.  Rover is a red dog and Redford is a cardinal, which is a red bird.  Reese is very curly and fuzzy, with brown and white hair all over. "You won't find me in a zooI'll never scratch or bark at youI'm better than a dog or catA guinea pig is where it's at!"

questions.text: What kind of spaniel is Regal?
questions.explanation:
King Charles Spaniel.

	Regal is a mostly white dog with long-haired brown ears and a partly brown face.  Spunky the dog is another spaniel, but he is a Cocker Spaniel. "It's not easy being KingI just want to do my thingI would rather jump and playThan sit on my throne today!"

questions.text: What kind of dog is Rescue?
questions.explanation:
Dalmatian.

	Rescue is a Dalmatian with a red collar and an American flag on his right arm.  He was made without a poem, but instead, this inscription... "To honor our heroeswho lost their lives in thenational catastrophe thattook place on September 11, 2001.We mourn for them and express ourdeepest sympathy to their families. God Bless America"

questions.text: Which of these has a baby attached?
questions.explanation:
Ricochet.

	Ricochet is a kangaroo.  But unlike Pouch the kangaroo, there is more to the baby joey than just a head.  In fact, the entire body is in that pouch, so if you pulled the joey out you would have a whole new toy to play with. "As if I'm on a pogo stick I jump and bounce; I move so quickI'll ricochet on by so fastYou'll barely see me hopping past!"

questions.text: Which of these is a raccoon?
questions.explanation:
Ringo.

	Ringo is a brown raccoon with black stripes around his tail and black eye spots, like a mask.  Raccoons are nocturnal, and love shiny things, and anything they can eat. "Ringo hides behind his maskHe will come out, if you should askHe loves to chitter. He loves to chatter Just about anything, it doesn't matter!"

questions.text: Which of these is a blue bird?
questions.explanation:
Rocket.

	Rocket is a blue jay.  Redford is the only other "R" bird.  The other two do not exist. "Rocket is the fastest blue jay everHe flies in all sorts of weatherAerial tricks are his specialtyHe's so entertaining for you and me!"

questions.text: Which of these is a dog?
questions.explanation:
Rootbeer.

	Ronnie and Racer are both bears.  Racer comes in several different colors.  Rooftop is a reindeer.  Rootbeer is a dark brown pug dog with a black, wrinkly mouth and nose. "A scoop of ice cream in a mugFor me, your most favorite pugAdd root beer for the perfect treatGrab a straw! C'mon let's eat!"

questions.text: Which of these is NOT a word used in Rumba's poem?
questions.explanation:
Brum-ba.

	There was once a restaurant here in my hometown called "Potato Brumbas," but Rumba does not use this in his poem!  Rumba is a fat tiger.  He has a light orange body with brown stripes, and his stomach is white. "Let's toot the horns and beat the drum-baC'mon and play and don't be glum-baIt doesn't matter where you're from-baWe'll do the dance that's called the rum-ba!"

questions.text: What kind of animal could Runner be?
questions.explanation:
All of these.

	On the Ty Beanie Babies official website, they call Runner a "mustelidae."  Mustelidae is the scientific term for the weasel family.  In Runner's poem, they call him a weasel, a ferret, a mongoose, and a mink.  Since most mustelidae look like Runner, you can make him whatever you want to make him! "A ferret, mongoose, weasel or mink What am I...what do you think? Find a book, look and see I'm whatever you want me to be!"
